title: How to Know if Someone Unmatched You on Bumble

steps.title: Open Bumble.
steps.content: Open Bumble. This app icon looks like a beehive on a yellow background.

steps.title: Navigate to your chats.
steps.content: Navigate to your chats. Tap the chat bubble icon in the bottom left corner of your screen. [2] X Research source You'll also see matches in the "Match Queue" that you've matched with.

steps.title: Look for greyed-out chats (if you're currently in a conversation with someone you think unmatched you).
steps.content: Look for greyed-out chats (if you're currently in a conversation with someone you think unmatched you). Any chats that are greyed out at the bottom of the list mean the other person has unmatched you. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Check your "Match Queue."
steps.content: Check your "Match Queue." The missing profiles are those that have unmatched you. [4] X Research source
